TextView.android:text: An SER, Speech Emotion Recognition, is a system that analyses voice lines to output what emotions are expected or meant to be expressed in a particular statement. This application consists of many algorithmic approaches however some of them are kernael perceptron, support vector machines(SVM), Gaussian processes etc. The factual purpose is that it has pre stored values in relations to the sound attributes, for instance: amplitude, frequency, crest etc. The idea behind this is to gather data and train the model, therefore in short, as more data are analyzed the more the accuracy of it improves. With the help of Machine Learning, it can support the statements mentioned above, recognising the hardest of voice lines, despite accent, tones or even background noises. The accuracy of our current program is at its satisfactory level, however as time passes by achieving greater pi point accuracy will be within our ease
